column5: Has anyone used Reef Runners/Ripsticks/Deep Runner in BOQ for walleye?  If so what colours, models and sizes should I be looking to get?
There is a new one out called Bare Naked...got a 10 lber and a 7 lber on it in November.

Have to agree bigtime with Stoty purple hues always seem to be the top producers for me in Quinte over the last 10+ years. Of course you ALWAYS have to have a perch or firetiger behind the boat as well.
.. first ya need a chainsaw!... then ya cut a 100 meter long trench in the ice... then ya worry aboot what color!!!   Pink and black!!!
